channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Walz And Frey Should Be Arrested For Inciting 2020 2.0
item.description: The corrupt governor and his radical Minneapolis sidekick have long demonized ICE agents. Wednesday's events should come as no surprise.

item.description: Rep. Steny Hoyer, Maryland Democrat, will reportedly announce his retirement from Congress on Thursday.

item.title: Yes, ICE Agents Can Defend Themselves From People Using Cars As Murder Weapons
item.description: Vehicles are deadly weapons, and crazed lunatics using them that way should expect a proportionate response.
